title: Improve native build process + add Nano Server
body:
**Description of Change**

This PR does a few things to get us to a better place:
- make it so that we can `dotnet cake` in some native folder, and we get the assets for it
- make it so that we actually have the ability to build linux-nodeps and nanoserver locally
- add support for Nano Server #1014 #675 

**Bugs Fixed**

- Redo of #1014
- Fixes #675 

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
